page.title: 11Young People's Recreation.
page.content: Children can take part in a variety of organised ball games in Keynsham. In the Memorial Park there are several tennis courts, and tuition courses are arranged during school holidays. Another summer sport,cricket, takes place near The Wellsway at Keynsham Cricket Club. Children are invited to join from Under-9 Level upwards. At the other end of town, the winter sports of soccer and rugby are played. Keynsham Rugby Club invite children from Under- 9 Level upwards to practise on the Crown Fields, Bristol Road. Somerdale Wanderers play on Cadbury Schweppes playing fields (still known locally as Fry's). A judo club is run at the Fear Insti- tute in the High Street. Tap and ballet classes are also offered there. Although the B.M.X. track on Bath Hill is closed it is shortly to reopen.
